@Version(value="5.11") @Export(attribute="provide:=true")

Package com.day.cq.wcm.foundation.forms

Defines package version.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FormsManager
    The forms manager keeps track of all available actions and constraints.
    FormsManager.ComponentDescription  
    FormStoreService
    Service that runs the Form Store action.
    FormStructureHelper
    Interface for retrieving form properties from different form node structures.
    FormStructureHelperFactory
    Interface to provide instances of FormStructureHelper
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FieldDescription
    A description of a form field as it is later used in the html form.
    FieldHelper
    Helper class for the field components.
    FormResourceEdit
    Helper class for bulk editing of multiple resources via CQ forms and the Sling POST servlet.
    FormResourceEdit.CommonAndPartial
    Helper struct for the result of FormResourceEdit.getCommonAndPartialMultiValues(List, String).
    FormsConstants
    Some constants for the forms components.
    FormsHandlingRequest  
    FormsHandlingResponse  
    FormsHandlingServletHelper
    A helper for form handling.
    FormsHelper
    Helper class for the forms components.
    LayoutHelper
    Helper class for the forms components for layouting.
    MergedMultiResource
    MergedMultiResource is a synthetic resource that presents a merged view on multiple resources.
    MergedValueMap
    MergedValueMap merges the values of the value maps from multiple resources.
    RedirectRequest
    This request wrapper adds a redirect parameter.
    ValidationHelper Deprecated
    Check the methods for alternatives.
    ValidationInfo
    This class collects validation information (error messages) for a form.
